lead_paragraph: Olympic hopefuls Dathan Ritzenhein and Shalane Flanagan put on impressive performances in winning the USA Cross Country Championships at San Diego’s Mission Bay Park.Ritzenhein, 25, took the lead at the halfway mark of the 12-kilometer race and cruised to victory in the Men’s Open division in 35 minutes, 3 seconds. In the women’s 8K open race, Flanagan, 26, took the lead at the outset and finished in 25:26 to win by more than a minute.
